welcome.title: Welcome to BeCoMe
welcome.subtitle: Best Compromise Mean
welcome.description: Learn how to use the platform in just a few steps. This quick tour will show you how to create projects, gather expert opinions, and see aggregated results.

createProject.title: Create a Project
createProject.description: Start by creating a new project. Give it a name, description, and set the scale for expert opinions.
createProject.hint: The scale defines the range for expert estimates

inviteExperts.title: Invite Experts
inviteExperts.description: Add team members to your project by their email address. Only registered users can be invited.
inviteExperts.hint: Experts will see the invitation in their dashboard

enterOpinion.title: Enter Your Opinion
enterOpinion.description: Express your estimate using three values that form a fuzzy triangular number.
enterOpinion.rule: Values must satisfy: Lower ≤ Peak ≤ Upper

viewResults.title: View Results
viewResults.description: Once experts submit their opinions, BeCoMe calculates the optimal group decision.

metrics.bestCompromiseDesc: The optimal aggregation of all expert opinions

viewResults.hint: Results update automatically as experts submit

complete.title: You're Ready!
complete.description: You now know the basics of BeCoMe. Start your first project and gather expert opinions.
